Someone will write the exact instructions how to install it?

Since a lot of people are having problems installing and know one wrote instructions yet i guess i will.

1. Download 7zip (http://7-zip.org/) (the x64 version doesn't work download the x32 one)
2. download demon tools 4.30. (http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads) (if you cant mount the MDS tits because you have the wrong version of daemon tools.)
3. Mount the .ISO "STALKER_COP_PlayBay" and install it.
4. Download the "Stalker No-DVD/Fixed Image" (http://m0004.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_stalker_call_of_pripyat.shtml)
5. Extract it and run the "FIX.REG".
6. Reboot windows.
7. Mount the "STALKER.COP.PLAYBAY.MDS" Mini-Image ( With RMPS Emulation enabled in Daemon tools.)
8. Play the game.
9. And remember to seed.

This Game works perfect. Everyone whos having a problem ... its not your OS like Vista/XP/Win7. Simply install 7zip, the 32-bit version, no matter if you have an 64-bit OS. Install it, then get yourself DaemonTools Lite 4,30 from the DT homepage. Mount the Image, run the Setup.exe. Install and repair Netframeswork if you get asked to do so. Apply the Fan-Translation you can find elsewhere on the net and use the Trivium NODVD Cookie. Works perfect for me....

All you need to know is the Games a compressed version which needs 7zip to be able extract the content. If you dont own 7zip 32-bit version its not a Uploaders fault, its your failure by not readin one of the very first comments.

Easy Install ^^

This is really crappy torrent, no sufficient info about install. However, I managed to make it work. It took me about 30 minutes to figure what is missing. U need:
1. install 7-zip
2. install game from virtual drive (Alcohol, Daemon, UltraISO...)
3. download http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?d3dx9_41 and put it in \bin folder
4. download http://dl.gamecopyworld.com/?d=2009&f=stalker_zp_triada!7z and replace file in \bin folder
5. download rus->eng translations from http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5103373/S.T.A.L.K.E.R._-_Call_of_Pripyat_-_Russian_to_English_Translatio and follow SCoP_BearEnglish_Readme.txt from Bear_English.rar
6. enjoy!


gretz from Cro ;-)
